articles.title: Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il Erected at Command of KPA Air and Anti-Air Force
articles.content:
Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il Erected at Command of KPA Air and Anti-Air Force
 Pyongyang, November 30 (KCNA) -- The statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il were erected at the Command of the Air and Anti-Air Force of the Korean People's Army (KPA).
					 A ceremony of unveiling the statues was held on Saturday on the Day of Airmen.
					
					 Present there were Hwang Pyong So, Ri Yong Gil and other commanding officers of the KPA, service personnel of the Air and Anti-Air Force, employees, servicemen's families and officials and those of meritorious service of units which contributed to erecting the statues.
					
					 The statues were unveiled by leading officials of the army and commanding officers of the Air and Anti-Air Force.
					
					 Placed before the statues were a floral basket in the name of Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the KPA.
					
					 Also laid before them were floral baskets in the joint name of the Central Committee of the WPK, the Central Military Commission of the WPK and the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and in the name of the Air and Anti-Air Force.
					
					 Laid before the statues were floral baskets in the name of the KPA General Political Bureau, the Ministry of the People's Armed Forces, the KPA General Staff, units at all levels of the Air and Anti-Air Force and units associated with the leadership feats of the commanders of Mt. Paektu.
					
					 All the participants paid tribute to the peerless great men in humble reverence.
					
					 KPA Vice Marshal Hwang Pyong So, director of the KPA General Political Bureau, made an unveiling address.
					
					 Kim Il Sung, the founding father of the army, very busy as he was with the work to build the party, state and army right after the liberation of Korea, created the air force before anything else with his clairvoyant wisdom and extraordinary farsightedness and clearly indicated the way to be followed by it in each period and at each stage of the developing revolution, the speaker said.
					
					 In the whole period of leading the Songun revolution Kim Jong Il made indefatigable efforts and journeys of devoted service to develop the Air and Anti-Air Force into the one strongest in idea and faith and invincible combat ranks, he noted.
					
					 He called for more dynamically advancing to win the final victory of the Songun revolution under the leadership of Kim Jong Un, the eternal banner of victory of the great Paektusan nation, as befitting the descendants of Kim Il Sung and soldiers and disciples of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The participants were being briefed on the statues before going round them.

articles.title: Pak Pong Ju Greets PM of Barbados
articles.content:
Pak Pong Ju Greets PM of Barbados
 Pyongyang, November 30 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Pak Pong Ju Sunday sent a message of greeting to Freundel Stuart, prime minister of Barbados, on the occasion of the 48th anniversary of its independence.
					 The message wished the prime minister success in his work for the independent development and prosperity of the country, expressing the belief that the long-standing friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger.

articles.title: Rallies of Province, Cities and Counties Held
articles.content:
Rallies of Province, Cities and Counties Held
 Pyongyang, November 30 (KCNA) -- Rallies of service personnel and people took place in Ryanggang Province, cities and counties to support the statement of the National Defence Commission (NDC) of the DPRK and vow to mercilessly shatter the anti-DPRK "human rights" campaign kicked up by the U.S. imperialists and their followers.
					 The statement of the NDC was read out at the rallies.
					
					 Representatives of the service personnel of the Korean People's Army, workers, agricultural workers, youth and students in their speeches bitterly condemned the campaign kicked up by the U.S. through high-handed and arbitrary practices.
					
					 There can never exist any "human rights issue" under the Korean-style socialist system where the dignity and rights of human beings are fully guaranteed and the dream and ideal of the people are translated into a brilliant reality, they said.
					
					 The reckless moves of the U.S. imperialists and their followers to bring down the socialist system, the cradle of the Korean people's life, have gone beyond the danger line, they noted, adding the patience of the army and people of the DPRK has its limit and they will not pardon the hateful provokers even a bit.
					
					 No force on earth can arrest the just cause of the army and people of the DPRK who have turned out as one in the retaliatory sacred war to resolutely smash the heinous "human rights" racket kicked up by the U.S. imperialists and their followers, they stressed.
					
					 Then followed demonstrations of the participants in the rallies.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Behest Is Important Guidelines for Building Thriving Nation: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Behest Is Important Guidelines for Building Thriving Nation: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, November 30 (KCNA) -- The behest of leader Kim Jong Il is scientific and encyclopedic guidelines indicating the shortcut to building a thriving socialist nation and a militant banner whose great vitality has been proved in revolutionary practice, says Rodong Sinmun Sunday in an article.
					 His behest serves as precious guidelines for triumphantly advancing the cause of building of a thriving nation of Juche Korean way and with indigenous efforts and an all-powerful treasured sword for bringing about a great leap forward and innovations on all fronts for building a thriving nation, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 It was thanks to him that the Korean-style mode of revolution and creation was provided and a wide avenue paved for energetically stepping up the building of a thriving nation.
					
					 The DPRK could successfully advance the building of a thriving socialist nation despite the imperialists' persistent moves for isolating and stifling it and economic blockade against it in recent years. This was possible because it made a steady advance without an inch of deviation on the principle of independence, taking hold on his behest as guidelines.
					
					 The fierce flames of the industrial revolution in the new century raged on this land, the age of knowledge-based economy was ushered in, monumental edifices appeared in different parts of the country and many models of the Songun culture created. All these events would be unthinkable apart from his leadership.
					
					 His behest serves as an ever-victorious banner which helps Korean-style socialism win victory after victory under the unfurled banner of Songun.
					
					 With no machinations can the enemy bar socialist Korea from advancing under the uplifted banner of Songun. His Songun revolutionary idea and feats serve as eternal assets of the Korean revolution and a treasured sword for winning certain victory which has been proved in the stern test of history.
					
					 The DPRK's principle of Songun and the revolutionary principle remain unchanged no matter how the world may change and in whatever storm and stress.
					
					 It is the unshakable will of the Workers' Party of Korea and all service personnel and people of the DPRK to win the final victory, invariably taking the road of independence, Songun and socialism traversed by him all his life, under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Warns Japan of Its Catastrophic Fate
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Warns Japan of Its Catastrophic Fate
 Pyongyang, November 30 (KCNA) -- Recently, the U.S. officially clarified the stand that its forces in Japan would automatically get involved in contingency on the Korean Peninsula without prior consultation with the latter, says Rodong Sinmun Sunday in a commentary.
					 The real purpose of this announcement timed to coincide with the hideous anti-DPRK "human right" racket kicked up by the U.S. at the UN is to launch invasion of the DPRK and the second Korean war, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 The DPRK is left with no option but to clarify its resolute stand as the U.S. openly declared the stand-off of force while revealing its ambition to stifle the former by force of arms.
					
					 It is the stand of the DPRK to react to the U.S. provocation of the war with operations for blowing up the bases for its aggression.
					
					 It will remain unfazed though the U.S. mobilizes its forces in Japan, Guam and Hawaii and even from its mainland.
					
					 Through the above-said announcement the U.S. clearly projected its relations with Japan and the role to be played by the U.S. forces in Japan.
					
					 The relations between the U.S. and Japan are those between the master and his servant from A to Z.
					
					 The U.S. is praising Japan as its "ally" but this is just talking. Its ulterior aim is to use the Japanese territory as a forward base and nuclear advanced base for invading Korea and Asia and "Self-Defense Forces" as cannon fodder.
					
					 Sometimes Japan is calling for "independence" which is hardly achievable.
					
					 Japan had better bear in mind that the escalated tensions on the Korean Peninsula would put its destiny on a chopping board. Acting without any principle would only invite a catastrophic fate.

articles.title: Unreasonable Decision of S. Korean Court under Fire
articles.content:
Unreasonable Decision of S. Korean Court under Fire
 Pyongyang, November 30 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet Seoul Central District Court on Nov. 26 sentenced to prison term Pak Sok Un, co-representative of the Solidarity for Progress, for the mere reason that he took part in a candlelight action against the import of American beef, according to KBS of south Korea.
					 This is a product of base intrigues to calm down protests against the south Korean regime's sycophancy towards the U.S. and unpopular rule.

articles.title: S. Korean People Fall Victim to War Maneuvers against DPRK
articles.content:
S. Korean People Fall Victim to War Maneuvers against DPRK
 Pyongyang, November 30 (KCNA) -- A bullet pierced a ceiling and a window of an office room and fell before a building in Yongbuk-myon in Phochon City, Kyonggi Province on Nov. 21, gravely threatening the lives of people, according to CBS of south Korea.
					 It was reported that the U.S. imperialist aggressors were undergoing a shooting drill in the nearby firing range.

articles.title: Discriminations against Korean Schools Protested in Japan
articles.content:
Discriminations against Korean Schools Protested in Japan
 Pyongyang, November 30 (KCNA) -- Demonstrations took place in Osaka, Japan on Nov. 20 to protest against the Japanese government's unreasonable discrimination against Korean schools.
					 Present there were teachers and students of Korean School in Osaka and their parents and other Koreans in Japan and Japanese figures.
					
					 The demonstrators denounced the Osaka Prefecture and City Authorities of Japan for taking the unreasonable step of suspending the payment of educational subsidies to Korean schools and condemned the Japanese government for excluding them only from tuition-free program for senior high schools.
					
					 They conducted information services, scattering leaflets censuring the discrimination against Korean schools.

articles.title: Joint Seminar on Kim Jong Il's Revolutionary Career and Exploits Held in Rome
articles.content:
Joint Seminar on Kim Jong Il's Revolutionary Career and Exploits Held in Rome
 Pyongyang, November 30 (KCNA) -- Political parties and organizations in Europe held a joint seminar on the great revolutionary career and undying exploits of leader Kim Jong Il in Rome on Nov. 22. 
					 Hanging on the front wall of the venue was the portrait of smiling Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 On display in the venue were works of Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un and books introducing Songun Korea.
					
					 It was attended by delegates of political parties and organizations in European countries including the Movement for Peace and Socialism of Italy, the Communist Party of Italy, the Socialist Party of Romania, the Revolutionary Communist Party of Britain (Marxist-Leninist), the French Revolutionary Communist League, the Communists' League of Finland, the Communist Party of Malta, the Communist Party of Austria, the Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Poland-Korea Association and personages of the European Society for the Study of the Juche Idea. 
					
					 The participants paid silent tribute to Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 Vasile Orleanu, chairman of the Supreme Council of the Socialist Party of Romania, made a keynote report which was followed by speeches. 
					
					 The reporter and speakers referred to the fact that Kim Jong Il performed great exploits in all fields including politics, economy, military affairs and culture all his great life. 
					
					 Recalling that he clarified the theory of Songun politics on the basis of the Juche idea and turned socialist Korea into a worldwide political, ideological and military power which no formidable imperialist aggressor forces dare attack, they noted this was his greatest exploit.
					
					 His exploits will last forever, they stressed. 
					
					 The joint seminar adopted a letter to Kim Jong Un and a joint appeal to the communist parties, workers' parties and other progressive parties and organizations in different countries.

articles.title: Letter to Kim Jong Un from Participants in Joint Seminar in Rome
articles.content:
Letter to Kim Jong Un from Participants in Joint Seminar in Rome
 Pyongyang, November 30 (KCNA) -- Marshal Kim Jong Un received a letter from the participants in the joint seminar of European political parties and organizations on the great revolutionary career and immortal exploits of leader Kim Jong Il held in Rome Nov. 22.
					 The letter said Kim Jong Il's life was the brilliant one of a revolutionary who firmly defended the revolution and socialism, upholding the red flag in the period when the world socialist movement suffered a stern trial.
					
					 It praised him as the noblest patriot who devoted his all to the development of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), the happiness of the Korean people and the building of a thriving nation without a moment's rest. 
					
					 Under his leadership the WPK developed into the revolutionary party of Juche type dynamically steering the revolution and construction, the letter said, and went on:
					
					 By pursuing the unique Songun politics he defended socialist idea and turned the DPRK into a political and military power, supporting and encouraging the world progressive people.
					
					 His noble life and revolutionary exploits will be conveyed to posterity and his image will shine forever along with the development of the WPK and the victorious advance of the human cause of independence.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered
 Pyongyang, November 30 (KCNA) -- The participants in the joint seminar on the great revolutionary career and undying exploits of leader Kim Jong Il held by political parties and organizations in the European region sent a joint appeal to the communist parties, workers' parties and other progressive parties and organizations of various countries on Nov. 22.
					 The appeal said:
					
					 December 17 in 2014 marks the 3rd anniversary of demise of Kim Jong Il, eternal general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK). 
					
					 He was the great leader in the era of independence who devoted all his life to the development of the WPK, the happiness of the Korean people and the victorious advance of the global socialist cause with his extraordinary ideological and theoretical wisdom, outstanding leadership, indomitable will and warm love for the people.
					
					 The socialist cause in the DPRK started by President Kim Il Sung and led by Kim Jong Il is being successfully carried forward by Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the WPK, the Korean people are ushering in a heyday of Songun Korea, firmly convinced of the final victory, upholding the banner of independence, Songun and socialism.
					
					 Once again extending full support and solidarity to the WPK and the Korean people in their heroic struggle for building a thriving socialist nation, we ardently appeal to the communist parties, workers' parties and other progressive parties and organizations across the world to honor the memory of Kim Jong Il in the humblest reverence on December 17, the third anniversary of his demise, as he made undying contributions to the global socialist cause and the human cause of independence.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Lauded Abroad
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Lauded Abroad
 Pyongyang, November 30 (KCNA) -- Seminars on the exploits of leader Kim Jong Il took place in Indonesia, the Czech Republic and Ethiopia on Nov. 17 and 20 to commemorate the third anniversary of his demise. 
					 Present at the seminars were personages of the Diversity Party of Indonesia, the Pribram County Committee and the Kutna Hora County Committee of the Czechy-Morava Communist Party of the Czech Republic and a branch of the Ethiopian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism and other masses.
					
					 The secretary general of the National Leading Council of the Diversity Party of Indonesia said Kim Jong Il was the greatest man who performed undying exploits for the global cause of independence with his matchless great idea and leadership ability. 
					
					 The chairman of the Pribram County Committee of the Czechy-Morava Communist Party of the Czech Republic said though three years have passed since Kim Jong Il passed away so suddenly, he is always alive in the hearts of the world progressive people. 
					
					 The chief of a branch of the Ethiopian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism said there are many great men who made contributions to the progressive development of mankind in the history but it knows no such great man as HE Kim Jong Il who performed undying exploits for the global cause of independence with his great idea and leadership ability.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Praised by Figures of Bangladesh, Kuwait
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Praised by Figures of Bangladesh, Kuwait
 Pyongyang, November 30 (KCNA) -- M. Jahangir Khan, chairman of the Bangladesh Group for the Study of the Songun Policy, and Javid Ahmad, chairman of the Kuwait Asian Journalist Association and executive director of the Times Publishing House of Kuwait, released statements on Nov. 23 to commemorate the third anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's demise. 
					 Khan said Kim Jong Il comprehensively developed in depth the Juche idea and the Songun idea founded by President Kim Il Sung and firmly defended socialism from the imperialists' moves by pursuing the Songun politics. 
					
					 He met all the challenges of the imperialists with the might of Songun and turned socialist Korea into a political, ideological and military power and nuclear weapons state, Khan said, adding:
					
					 The great exploits he performed for the Korean revolution and the world revolution will shine forever. 
					
					 Ahmad said Kim Jong Il was a prominent thinker and theoretician, peerless elder statesman and Songun brilliant commander who led the revolutionary cause of Juche to one victory after another with his profound idea and theories and outstanding leadership and a peerless patriot and tender-hearted father of the people who devoted all his life to the country and its people. 
					
					 Thanks to his wise guidance the Juche idea and the Songun idea are shining as the great guiding ideas in the era of independence and the revolutionary traditions of Mt. Paektu have been firmly upheld and preserved, Ahmad noted, and went on:
					
					 As a result, the might of the party, state and army in the DPRK has been increased in every way, socialism is firmly defended and a solid foundation has been laid for the prosperity of the generations to come.

articles.title: Works of Kim Jong Il, Kim Jong Un Studied in Mexico and Britain
articles.content:
Works of Kim Jong Il, Kim Jong Un Studied in Mexico and Britain
 Pyongyang, November 30 (KCNA) -- A reading session and a seminar on works of leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un took place in Mexico and Britain on Nov. 15 and 20.
					 Jesus Antonio Carlos Hernandez, general secretary of the Central Committee of the People's Socialist Party of Mexico, read Kim Jong Il's work "Socialism Is a Science." Then he said:
					
					 Socialism in the DPRK is true socialism centered on the popular masses.
					
					 The DPRK is dynamically advancing along the road of socialism hewed by President Kim Il Sung while smashing the imperialists' moves to stifle it under the energetic leadership of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 I wish the Korean people big success in their struggle for building an economic power and reunifying the country in the future, too.
					
					 Andy Brooks, general secretary of the Central Committee of the New Communist Party of Britain, and others praised Kim Jong Il's revolutionary career and exploits at the seminar on Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us Brilliantly Accomplish the Revolutionary Cause of Juche, Holding Kim Jong Il in High Esteem as the Eternal General Secretary of Our Party".
					
					 They confirmed that Kim Jong Il's exploits would last forever and the Workers' Party of Korea will always triumph as the guiding force of the Korean people thanks to Kim Jong Un.
					
					 A message to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the seminar held in Britain.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Remembered by Foreign Media
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Remembered by Foreign Media 
 Pyongyang, November 30 (KCNA) -- Newspapers of Congo, DR Congo and Nigeria each devoted their whole pages to special write-ups illustrated with the portrait of smiling leader Kim Jong Il from Nov. 19 to 21 to commemorate the third anniversary of his demise. 
					 The Congolese paper Brazzaville Depeche carried articles under the titles "Great exploits of leader Kim Jong Il," "Efforts made for reunification of the country," "Tender-hearted father of people" and "Supreme leader of the Korean people Kim Jong Un".
					
					 The paper said Kim Jong Il was the tender-hearted father who devoted himself to the happiness of the Korean people.
					
					 It was his maxim that one should pluck even a star and bring a flower into bloom even on a rock if this is desired by the people, the paper added. 
					
					 The DR Congo paper La Prosperite carried articles titled "Greatest man" and "Defender of socialism" under the headline "Leader Kim Jong Il's idea and exploits will last forever". 
					
					 The paper said he firmly defended socialism, upholding the banner of Songun. 
					
					 He who devoted his all to the happiness of the Korean people and global independence till the last moments of his life will always be alive in the hearts of the Korean people and other world progressives as a beaming image of the sun, the paper stressed.
					
					 The Nigerian paper Nigerian Observer carried articles titled "Snow and Kim Jong Il" and "Legacy of leader Kim Jong Il" under the headline "Noble life and immortal exploits of the great leader Kim Jong Il will always be remembered by progressive mankind." 
					
					 The paper introduced in detail the undying exploits he performed by devoting himself and said his sacred name will always remain shining along with the prosperity of socialist Korea.

articles.title: KPA's Victory in Yonphyong Island Shelling Marked Abroad
articles.content:
KPA's Victory in Yonphyong Island Shelling Marked Abroad
 Pyongyang, November 30 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy and the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea made public a joint statement on Nov. 21 on the occasion of the 4th anniversary of victory of the Korean People's Army (KPA) in the Yonphyong Island shelling battle. 
					 Four years have passed since the south Korean fascist forces were hit hard by the KPA for firing shells into the inviolable territorial waters of the DPRK from the Yonphyong Island despite the repeated warnings, the statement noted, and went on:
					
					 The south Korean puppet group's provocation was prompted by a daydream of defending the illegal "northern limit line".
					
					 The revolutionary armed forces of Juche Korea turned the Yonphyong Island, the base for the provocation, into a sea in flames, decisively foiling the enemy's daydream and reckless provocation.
					
					 The south Korean puppet group paid a dear price for its foolish behavior.
					
					 The Yonphyong Island shelling battle marked a historic event which demonstrated the matchless spirit, mettle and invincible might of the KPA which grew to be the powerful Paektusan army under the care of leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 If the U.S. imperialists and south Korean puppet group again provoke the DPRK, they will sustain the same heavy defeat as what they did during the Yonphyong Island incident.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK will always emerge victorious under the leadership of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Beninese Political Party Blasts Anti-DPRK "Human Rights Resolution"
articles.content:
Beninese Political Party Blasts Anti-DPRK "Human Rights Resolution"
 Pyongyang, November 30 (KCNA) -- The Socialist Party of Benin made public a statement on Nov. 25 in support of the statement of the National Defence Commission of the DPR of Korea.
					 The statement said:
					
					 The "human rights resolution" against the DPRK was rammed through the Third Committee of the 69th UN General Assembly through the U.S. high-handed practice, pressure and manipulation.
					
					 The U.S. perpetrated such a grave political provocation to bring down the social system in the DPRK at any cost under the pretext of its "human rights issue".
					
					 Lurking behind some countries of EU and Japan that fabricated the "resolution" was the U.S. hostile policy towards the DPRK to destroy Korean-style socialism by force. 
					
					 The U.S.-led hostile forces are seeking to politicize and internationalize the human rights issues of individual countries in the international arena and make a precedent for abusing them to bring down the social systems of those countries.
					
					 The Socialist Party of Benin and the Beninese people aspiring after socialism categorically reject and strongly condemn the "human rights resolution" fabricated by the U.S. and its servants in the UN.
					
					 The Socialist Party of Benin is convinced that the party, army and people of the DPRK will firmly protect the dignity and sovereignty of the country and build a thriving nation under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Levantadas estatuas de bronce de Generalisimos en comandancia de fuerzas aereas y antiaereas de EPC
articles.content:
Levantadas estatuas de bronce de Generalisimos en comandancia de fuerzas aereas y antiaereas de EPC
Pyongyang, 30 de noviembre (ACNC) -- Con motivo del Dia de Aviacion tuvo lugar el dia 29 la ceremonia de descubrimiento de las estatuas de bronce de los Generalisimos Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il en la comandancia de las fuerzas aereas y antiaereas del Ejercito Popular de Corea.
					Participaron en la ocasion Hwang Pyong So, Ri Yong Gil y otros comandantes del EPC, oficiales y soldados de las fuerzas aereas y antiaereas, empleados, familiares de militares, funcionarios y ameritados de las unidades que hicieron aporte al levantamiento de las estatuas de bronce.
					
					Los cuadros directivos del ejercito, miembros de mando de las fuerzas aereas y antiaereas quitaron el velo de las estatuas de bronce.
					
					Al pie de las estatuas de bronce fue colocado un cesto de flores a nombre del Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea.
					
					  Seguidamente, quedaron colocados un cesto de flores a nombre comun del Comite Central y la Comision Militar Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y el Comite de Defensa Nacional de la RPDC, y los otros a nombre de las fuerzas aereas y antiaereas, la Direccion Politica General del EPC, el Ministerio de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares, el Estado Mayor General del EPC, las unidades a todos niveles de las fuerzas aereas y antiaereas y las unidades donde estan impregnadas las hazanas de direccion de los generales del monte Paektu.
					
					  Todos los participantes rindieron homenaje a los grandes hombres sin pares.
					
					El discurso de la ocasion estuvo a cargo del vicemariscal del EPC Hwang Pyong So, jefe de la Direccion Politica General del EPC.
					
					El orador senalo que en el tiempo muy ocupado en que realizaba la causa de construccion del partido, el pais y el ejercito despues de la liberacion de la patria, el Generalisimo Kim Il Sung, padre de la fundacion del ejercito, fundo desde las fuerzas aereas con la sabiduria clarividente y la extraordinaria presciencia e ilumino el rumbo a seguir en cada epoca de la revolucion en desarrollo.
					
					Apunto que el Generalisimo Kim Jong Il fortalecio en todo el periodo de la direccion sobre la revolucion mediante el Songun las fuerzas aereas y antiaereas como destacamento fuerte en la idea y la fe e invencibles filas combativas.
					
					Subrayo que deben luchar con mas vigor por la victoria definitiva de la revolucion del Songun bajo la direccion del Comandante Supremo Kim Jong Un, bandera de la eterna victoria  de la gran potencia del monte Paektu como descendientes del Generalisimo Kim Il Sung, como soldados y discipulos del Generalisimo Kim Jong Il..
					
					Los participantes pasaron revista a las estatuas de bronce tras escuchar explicaciones correspondientes.
